meanings.sent1: The roebuck gracefully leaped over the fallen log.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a majestic roebuck in the forest yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The curious roebuck wandered into the garden and nibbled on some flowers.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the silhouette of a roebuck against the setting sun was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The hunter's heart raced as he caught sight of the elusive roebuck through his binoculars.

meanings.definition: A roe deer in its second year.
meanings.sent1: The young roebuck frolicked playfully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The forest ranger identified the roebuck by its distinctive markings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous roebuck managed to sneak past the fence and into the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent4: As swift as a roebuck, the athlete sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The farmer marveled at the growing size and strength of the roebuck as it matured.
